content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Inserter Production Line at position(23.5, 2.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine-1 for crafting inserters
- Two burner inserters:
  - One at position(21.5, 2.5) facing left
  - One at position(25.5, 2.5) facing left
- Two wooden chests:
  - Input chest at position(20.5, 2.5) containing 232 inserters
  - Output chest at position(26.5, 2.5)

### Smelting Area
Consists of five stone furnaces:
- Two furnaces at positions(0.0, 0.0) and (2.0, 0.0)
- Three furnaces at positions(4.0, 4.0), (6.0, 4.0), and one more nearby
Currently all furnaces are idle with no ingredients

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) extracting water
- Boiler at position(-2.5, 24.0) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at position(4.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Connected by two pipe networks:
  - Water system (ID 36547) connecting offshore pump to boiler
  - Steam system (ID 36551) connecting boiler to steam engine
- Electrical distribution network (ID 123372) with multiple electric poles

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Management Errors
- Ensure sufficient coal is maintained in inventory for boiler operation
- Keep required ingredients (iron plates, iron gear wheels) in inventory before attempting crafting operations

### Crafting System Errors
- Cannot craft items requiring furnace (like iron plates) directly - must use furnace
- Ensure all prerequisite materials are available before attempting to craft complex items
- For assembler operations, verify all required ingredients are present before starting assembly

### Power System Issues
- Monitor power system status to ensure continuous electricity supply
- Keep boiler fueled with coal to maintain steam production
- Ensure proper pipe connections between boiler and steam engine are maintained

### Assembly Machine Operation
- Verify assembler has power before attempting production
- Check all required ingredients are available in correct quantities
- Monitor assembler status for ingredient shortages or power issues
